item.wizards.spell_book/arcane.spell_bin:
Spell Book of Arcane Stargazers, using pure energy to focus powerful attacks on single targets
- Strengths: Focused magical damage against individual enemies
- Weaknesses: Very low defense
- Equipment: Lightly armored
item.wizards.spell_book/fire.spell_bindi:
Spell Book of Fire Stargazers, using fiery magic to defeat enemies both near and far
- Strengths: Magical damage dealt at large areas
- Weaknesses: Low defense and mobility
- Equipment: Lightly armored
item.wizards.spell_book/frost.spell_bind:
Spell Book of Frost Stargazers, using cold magic to slow enemies and control the battlefield
- Strengths: Magical damage that slows and freezes enemies
- Weaknesses: Low defense and mobility
- Equipment: Lightly armored
